title: Need help claiming warranty on HP Laptop
selftext:
My sister bought a laptop for ₹55000 in the month of June and by the end of July it suddenly stopped working. Took it to a service center here in hyderabad and they claim that there had been a "Thermal Event" and a warranty cannot be claimed. They instead sent us a quote for ₹43000 to replace the mother board. A basic search leads me to believe this is a common occurrence. 

I have put this up on twitter and they're giving me the usual run around and i have made no headway till now. At this point we cant afford to shell out another 43k and this has caused my sister to be unable to work in the mean time. 

Is there anyway i can get these guys to repair the laptop under warranty? 

Link to tweet is posted above for more information. 

Any help will be greatly appreciated!
comments: National Consumer Forum, visit the website or app and complain there.
